Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 25.0.3-9, affected by CVE-2024-45337
